author: CBS News
title: Amazon employees make damning accusations against company's virus precautions
description: Amazon employees staged a strike against the online retail giant earlier in the week. One worker claims he was fired for staging a walkout in New York, a claim the company denies. Another at the management level said she was told to keep an employee's coronav…
